summary: This is a brief email from Ysmael Joaquin forwarding an injury report for inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates official documentation of an injury sustained by Epstein while in custody.

persons.name: Ysmael Joaquin
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email containing an injury report for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the attached injury report, indicating he sustained an injury while in custody.

connections.description: Joaquin is sending documentation (injury report) concerning inmate Epstein.

events.title: Injury Report Forwarded
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an injury report for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An injury report was generated for Jeffrey Epstein while he was an inmate.
The report was forwarded via email on July 23, 2019.
The document is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
